name: Product name
upload_description: Select/drag and drop an image here (PNG, JPG, min size 500x500)
allow_wholesale_price: Allow customers to view wholesale prices
allow_wholesale_price_subtitle: Only show wholesale prices in Book Market; Ask for Price
add_ingredient_to_product: Add ingredients to create this product

warning.warning_out_of_stock: Out of stock products will be removed from the cart. Return stock / add inventory for sale.

error.name: Product name cannot be empty
error.min_normal_price: Selling price must be greater than 0
error.variant_name: The taxonomy name cannot be empty
error.selling_price: Promotion price cannot be greater than the selling price
error.accept_file: Please select an image with the extension
error.blocked_quantity: Unsold inventory cannot be larger than inventory quantity
error.historical_cost: Historical cost must not be greater than selling price
error.min_historical_cost: Historical cost must be greater than 0
error.warning_value: Must not be greater than inventory quantity
error.quantity: Inventory quantity must be greater than unsold inventory
error.price_greater_than_zero: Product price must be greater than 0
error.min_quantity_greater_than_zero: Minimum purchase quantity must be greater than 0
error.equal_normal_price: Wholesale price cannot be greater than or equal to selling price
error.not_setting_ingredients_yet: Not setting enough ingredients for variant yet
error.at_least_one_ingredient: Choose at least 1 ingredient to create

action.not_show_hint_again: Do not show this message again

sub_title.product_variant: Create a taxonomy if the product has many different attributes like color, size...

ingredients_hint.first: Automatically calculate historical cost and inventory of products from ingredients
ingredients_hint.second: Hide products on the website when the inventory of ingredients is 0
ingredients_hint.third: Unable to manage products with basic/advanced inventory after agreeing
